release.change: Some internal house-keeping and clean-up
Fixed theme switch
Added battery from/to % back to screen (optionally)
Notification area should be invisible by default
Fixed infinite alarm per hour
Ditched cards for a better use of the real estate
A first shot at german I18N
Fixed broken changelog
Add dark Theme
An attempt to work around BATTERY_INFO service not being reachable on some devices
Surface errors that may occur while processing stats
Work around kernel wakelock file not being accessible if SELinux is not permissive
Automatically fall back to API mode for alarms if SELinux is not permissive
Fixed infinite values of gauges in Alarms
Switched to SDK 21
Fixed missing white heading in RAW stats
Fixed gauges in raw stats always shown 100%
Implemented "back" navigation in toolbar
Toolbar follows L guidelines (no logo)
Begun externalization of strings for translation
Added advanced settings to avoid using dumpsys for alarms (bypasses the need for permissive SELinux)
Totally new and shiny
Refactored time and timespan calculations: should avoid any rounding error
Added ability to save dumpfiles in JSON format from tasker plugin
Removed sorting
Removed google analytics
Removed graph zoom
